title: Biddr
description: Biddr is a web application that simulates the bidding problem in game theory, allowing players to strategize and compete in multiple auction scenarios. It helps analyze optimal bidding strategies and decision-making dynamics.

title: Ghilli
description: Ghilli is a mobile application designed for organizing and scoring kabaddi matches, providing real-time updates and performance tracking for teams and players.It offers an intuitive interface to manage tournaments, record match statistics, and analyze player performance efficiently.

title: Customer Behaviour and Personality Predictor
description: Customer Personality Predictor analyzes purchase behavior to classify customers into specific types and predict their respective personalities. This helps businesses tailor personalized recommendations and improve customer engagement.

title: Automated HR
description: Automated HR is an application that leverages natural language processing for resume screening, followed by a quiz to assess candidates. It selects candidates for the next round based on combined resume and quiz scores.

title: Customer Lifetime Value
description: Customer Lifetime Value Prediction estimates the total value a customer will bring over their lifetime based on relevant features. This helps businesses optimize marketing strategies and improve customer retention.

title: Super mart Data Analysis
description: Supermarket Data Analysis uses K-means clustering to segment customers based on sales data, identifying their value to the business. Classification models are then applied to predict the behavior and value of future customers.

title: Oracle Financial Statement Analysis
description: A dynamic dashboard analyzes Oracle's financial statements from 2019 to 2022, including the Balance Sheet, P&L, and Cash Flow. It also predicts the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for key financial metrics.
